subject: Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
Stadiums and Arenas
Suits and Litigation
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The team’s chief executive said it is committed to moving to the yet-to-be-built Barclays Center, overcoming economic concerns and legal opposition.
snippet: The team’s chief executive said it is committed to moving to the yet-to-be-built Barclays Center, overcoming economic concerns and legal opposition.
